title: Hi, I'm Jean Carlo Ocampo
info-description: I am passionate about continuous learning and programming, with experience in technologies such as MVC, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Java (using NetBeans and Android Studio), SQL Server, C#, React, Node.js, and Next.js. I have developed comprehensive projects using JavaScript, React Native, and Java, applying them to solutions for mobile, desktop, and web applications. I constantly stay up-to-date with the latest technological trends, always aiming to improve my technical skills and contribute innovation in every project.
pd1: A dashboard with dynamic charts and REST API.
pd2: Online store with payments and persistent shopping cart
pd3: Motion design + GSAP for smooth animations.
